title: Please Riot
body:
I have had over 4k views and not one person can help? the problem seems to be that it won't let me in the loading screen for more then 10-12 seconds, if i'm in the loading screen for that long it kick's me, regardless of if the team is in game or not. so if the game hasn't started, i don't get in, if the game has started, i have to be not lagging to get in.
Please anyone!!!!!!
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/0LMiA0In-loading-troubles
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/rpf8vsz5-need-help-please-please

replies.body:
Submit a support ticket, if noone can help you here (which it seems they can't) then that is your best bet.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
